title: Face/Off Pt 2, KKK Reboot: The Bundy Version 2.16.21
itunes:title: Face/Off Pt 2, KKK Reboot: The Bundy Version 2.16.21
description:
In episode 812, Jack and Miles are joined by performer and activist Behzad Dabu to discuss the charges against the Buffalo cops, the Oath Keepers, Ammon Bundy, Nikki Haley breaking from Trump, the Face/Off remake, Gina Carano, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Charges dismissed against Buffalo cops who shoved elderly protester
  2. Jessica Watkins, 'Oath Keepers' Leader, Was Waiting For Directions From Trump Ahead of Inauguration
  3. Ammon Bundy, veteran of armed standoffs, builds militia network on COVID backlash
  4. Nikki Haley breaks with Trump: 'We shouldn't have followed him'
  5. That ‘Face/Off’ Remake is Actually a “Direct Sequel,” According to Director Adam Wingard
  6. Gina Carano Hits Back, Announces New Movie Project With Ben Shapiro’s Daily Wire: “They Can’t Cancel Us If We Don’t Let Them”
  7. The Ugly Backstory of Ben Shapiro’s First Movie ‘Run Hide Fight’
  8. Gina Carano Hits Back, Announces New Movie Project With Ben Shapiro’s Daily Wire: “They Can’t Cancel Us If We Don’t Let Them”
  9. Where to Watch ‘Run Hide Fight’ Movie
  10. WATCH: Jakob Ogawa - Velvet Light

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
